divs: Sighting Detailsat 9 pm on wensday, me and my boyfriend lee walked out of his house to go to the store. lee immeditly spotted it but i didn't. as we drove for a few minutes,lee pointed it out again.this time i saw it. we followed it for about an hour till we got into the compound, which is a place inpalm bay where there are streets but no houses people use it to to four wheele and shoot guns and race. anyways now where out there following what appers to be just a car sized light in the sky. i said to lee it would be cool if it would get closer, how soon i would regret those words. as where driving down that dark road by our selves lee said he was going toget there attentionby flashing our head light at it. the light that looked like a star then blinked back in the same pattern. i was so scard i took off as fast as i could and that was the last i saw
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Palm Bay
There was one other sighting in Palm Bay on or around January 21st 2009
Summary: Star flew slowly for an hour.
